actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Education, Arts, Humanities.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Education, Arts and Humanities

official_title: A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to provide loan deferments and loan forgiveness for students direct service and supervisory staff in agencies serving high-risk children and families from low-income communities.
short_title: Child and Family Service Staff Enhancement Act of 1990

summary.text: Child and Family Service Staff Enhancement Act of 1990 - Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to provide loan deferments and loan forgiveness under various student loan programs for individuals employed full-time by a public or private nonprofit child or family service agency to provide, or supervise the provision of, services to high-risk children and their families from low-income communities.

titles.title: Child and Family Service Staff Enhancement Act of 1990

A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to provide loan deferments and loan forgiveness for students direct service and supervisory staff in agencies serving high-risk children and families from low-income communities.
